name: Calyx Health, Inc.
description: Developer of an automated marketing platform designed for healthcare professionals and organizations. The company's platform sends personalized direct mail and emails to Medicare patients from their doctors, its system has tools to receive communication from doctors and patients, enabling Medicare Advantage payers, and value-based care providers to grow their aligned panels and assist with revenue management and communication.
one_liner: Developer of an automated marketing platform designed for healthcare professionals and organizations. The company's platform sends personalized direct mail and emails to Medicare patients from their doctors, its system has tools to receive communication from doctors and patients, enabling Medicare Advantage payers, and value-based care providers to grow their aligned panels and assist with revenue management and communication.
